name: Richard Rowland
description: I am very serious about finding my best friend, love, second half, kindred sprit, a woman, with whom I would feel loved and comfortable, a woman with whom I can be together for all times/the rest of my life and who would love me for who and what I am. It doesn’t matter how my woman looks like. Am working for British Petroleum Company as an Engineering in Manchester city United Kingdom, I have worked in some of the biggest vessels that carry millions of barrels of crude and have 150 men on board,i’m an Engineer I work offshore Drilling oil in the high sea.
